## Bio

Jeremy Ash's research is at the interface of cheminformatics, bioinformatics, and data science. He is an experienced software developer with a concentration on machine learning methods and user friendly software for the analysis of chemical data. Jeremy started off in bioinformatics, so he has a special interest in combining bioinformatics and cheminformatics methodologies.
